description: A region consisting of a large transmission mast in the western area of the world. Adds over 250 new screens and includes creature spawns for all gamemodes, arena unlocks, and some secrets to discover.
author: DOGGO
requirements: Requires The Mast.dll, BLThing.dll, CustomAssets.dll and Badlands

description: A relatively small and dark region that connects Shaded Citadel to Chimney Canopy.
author: LimeCultivist

description: Adds a new region connecting Shoreline, 5P, and Depths. An amalgamation of many of the game's unused rooms. Also includes a couple custom unlockable maps for arena mode. Includes Spanish Translation.
author: ANDREWFM

description: A dark and damp region connecting Outskirts, Shoreline and Farm arrays.
author: CarrotPudding

description: Aether Ridge is a derelict desalination rig to the north of Sky Islands. Includes over 200 new rooms, six new arenas, and more. Fully compatible with The Root and Badlands.
author: Kaeporo

description: A new region expanding on Subterranean, and The Exterior, with all new rooms. Made to give exploration focused players more Rain World to discover. Ported to CRS by doggo
author: Willburd

description: A new game+ style mod that reorganizes the game's regions, trying to rekindle the feelings of when you first got lost in Rain World.
author: WILLBURD

description: An inhospitable desert connecting the Farm Arrays to the Shoreline, left dry only by a huge dam blocking the sea's waters. Made by the Rain World Community.
author: REGION JAM

description: Replaces all of the shelter rooms in the original game to make the shelters more unique and interesting in their designs.
author: TRONSX&THALBER

description: A shaded ocean between Shoreline, Shaded Citadel, and The Mast, with a long abandoned location on the seafloor.
author: Wrayk
requirements: Requires SilverLizard.dll, ShelterBehaviors.dll, ManagePlacedObjects.dll, The Mast, and The Badlands

description: The Badlands is a region connecting Farm Arrays and Garbage Wastes. It features many secrets and unlockables, including three new arenas..
author: FISH

description: A small mod that replaces the Wall subregion with a brand new set of 10 rooms inspired by the old pyramid iterator concept. Meant to offer a new experience while keeping a vanilla feel.
author: FISH

description: A series of airborne mechanical islands between Outskirts, Chimney Canopy, and Shoreline
author: Wrayk

description: Fixes a few locations in the game that have missing geometry or visuals for things that are meant to be in the game.
author: Bwarch

description: Simple Arena Pack made for testing mod mechanics and development, or getting screenshots and gifs.
author: ZombieMan101

description: A new swampy region that connects Garbage Wastes and Shoreline
author: Fishswallower

description: A mysterious pantheon, flooded by water leaking from the Drainage System. This hostile region allows for fast travel between the surface and the deepest caves to those who manage to traverse its murky waters.
author: REGION JAM

description: THIS IS NOT A REGION. This is a test for publishing mods in CRS. Wearing vulture masks will reflect spears and adds a chance of surviving a hit in the body. Inspired by Enderzilla
author: Garrakx
